content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

No structures have been successfully created on the map as of the latest steps. All attempts to place entities have failed, resulting in no entities being present on the map.

## ERROR TIPS

### Persistent Placement Issues
- Ensure there are no global restrictions or settings that prevent entity placement. Check the game settings or permissions that might be affecting placement capabilities.
- Verify that the target area is clear of any hidden constraints or obstacles that might prevent entity placement.

### Errors when attempting to place entities
- Before attempting to place an entity, confirm that the target tile is not occupied or restricted by any map-wide constraints.
- Consider moving to the exact location and checking for any visible or invisible barriers that may be affecting placement.

### Errors with Map-Wide Restrictions
- Investigate any map-wide restrictions that may be preventing the placement of entities. This could involve checking game rules or settings that are not directly visible in the current interface.

### Errors with Permissions or Map Issues
- Confirm that the necessary permissions are granted for placing entities on the map. This may involve checking user roles or game settings that control building permissions.

### Errors related to Global Diagnostic
- Conduct a thorough inspection of the environment to identify any global restrictions or settings that might be affecting gameplay. This includes reviewing any game configuration files or settings panels available.

### Crafting and Inventory Management
- Regularly check the inventory for available resources and crafted items to ensure that all necessary components are available for building and placement activities.
